# ConnectTaggingKitAddin.OnBeginShutdown method

Occurs whenever OneNote shuts down while an add-in is running.

```csharp
public void OnBeginShutdown(ref Array custom)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| custom | An empty array that you can use to pass host-specific data for use in the add-in. |
